casebody.data:
Territory of the VIRGIN ISLANDS, petitioner,
v.
UNITED INDUSTRIAL, SERVICE, TRANSPORTATION, PROFESSIONAL AND GOVERNMENT WORKERS OF NORTH AMERICA SEAFARERS INTERNATIONAL UNION, on Behalf of Ernest BASON. No. 14-754. Supreme Court of the United States April 6, 2015.

Opinion

Motion of Office of the Territorial Public Defender for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
